ActTrust and Loan Companies Act
PrecisINFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ACTIVITIES (TRUST AND LOAN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS which allow Trust and Loan companies to engage in information technology activities for purposes or in circumstances that are materially related to the provision of financial products or services.
